# httpCookieStorage

**Instance Property**

The cookie store for storing cookies within this session.

## Declaration

```swift
var httpCookieStorage: HTTPCookieStorage? { get set }
```

## Discussion

This property determines the cookie storage object used by all tasks within sessions based on this configuration.

To disable cookie storage, set this property to `nil`.

For default and background sessions, the default value is the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/HTTPCookieStorage/shared] cookie storage object.

For [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/URLSessionConfiguration/ephemeral] sessions, the default value is a private cookie storage object that stores data in memory only, and is destroyed when you invalidate the session.

## Setting cookie policies

- **httpCookieAcceptPolicy**: A policy constant that determines when cookies should be accepted.
- **httpShouldSetCookies**: A Boolean value that determines whether requests should contain cookies from the cookie store.
- **HTTPCookie**: A representation of an HTTP cookie.
